quotes.name: Isaac Asimov
quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear lack of them.

quotes.name: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.

quotes.name: IBM Manual, 1925
quotes.quote: All parts should go together without forcing.  You must remember that the parts you are reassembling were disassembled by you.  Therefore, if you can’t get them together again, there must be a reason.  By all means, do not use a hammer.

quotes.name: Alan Bennett
quotes.quote: Standards are always out of date.  That’s what makes them standards.

quotes.name: Socrates
quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing.

quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget.  Teach me and I remember.  Involve me and I learn.
